mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate( mateCreateTime, mateUpdateTime, mateCampsite, mateCamptype, mateCampstart, mateCampend, lowestAge, highestAge, mateTitle, mateContent, friendlimit, memberlimit, contentId, userNo ) VALUES( now(), now(), #{mateCampsite},#{mateCamptype},#{mateCampstart}, #{mateCampend},#{lowestAge},#{highestAge}, #{mateTitle},#{mateContent},#{friendlimit},#{memberlimit}, #{contentId}, #{userNo} )
INSERT INTO mateCampStyle ( mateNo, style1, style2, style3 ) VALUES ( #{mateNo}, #{style1}, #{style2}, #{style3} )

INSERT INTO mateCampEquipRequire ( mateNo, brazier, burner, chair, icebox, lantern, powerstrip, sleepingbag, table1, tarp, tent) VALUES ( #{mateNo}, #{brazier}, #{burner}, #{chair}, #{icebox}, #{lantern}, #{powerstrip}, #{sleepingbag}, #{table1}, #{tarp}, #{tent})
mapper.select: SELECT mateNo from mate where mateCampstyle is null
mapper.update: UPDATE mate SET mateCampstyle = '1' WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}
UPDATE mate SET mateImageUrl = #{mateImageUrl} WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}

UPDATE mate SET mateUpdateTime = now(), mateCampsite = #{mateCampsite}, mateCampstart = #{mateCampstart}, mateCampend = #{mateCampend}, lowestAge = #{lowestAge}, highestAge = #{highestAge}, mateTitle = #{mateTitle}, mateContent = #{mateContent}, friendlimit = #{friendlimit}, memberlimit = #{memberlimit}, contentId = #{contentId} WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}

UPDATE mateCampEquipRequire SET brazier = #{brazier}, burner = #{burner}, chair = #{chair}, icebox = #{icebox}, lantern = #{lantern}, powerstrip = #{powerstrip}, sleepingbag = #{sleepingbag}, table1 = #{table1}, tarp = #{tarp}, tent = #{tent} WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}
UPDATE mate SET mateImageUrl = NULL WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}
mapper.select: select m.mateNo, m.mateCreateTime, m.mateUpdateTime, m.mateImageUrl, m.mateCampsite, m.mateCampstyle, m.mateCamptype, m.mateCampstart, m.mateCampend, m.contentId, m.mateStatus, m.userNo, m.lowestAge, m.mateContent, m.highestAge, m.mateTitle, m.memberlimit, u.userNickname from mate m, user u where m.userNo = u.userNo order by m.mateNo desc;
select count(*) from mate

SELECT m.mateNo, m.mateCreateTime, m.mateUpdateTime, m.mateImageUrl, m.mateCampsite, m.mateCampstart, m.mateCampend, m.userNo, m.mateCamptype, m.mateStatus, m.lowestAge, m.highestAge, m.mateTitle, m.mateContent, m.friendlimit, m.memberlimit, u.userProfileImage, u.userNickName FROM mate m, user u WHERE m.userNo = u.userNo AND mateNo = #{mateNo}

select u.userNo, r.userRatePoint, u.userNickname, c.campStyle1,c.campStyle2, c.campStyle3, c.campStyle4, c.campStyle5, c.campStyle6, m.mateListNo, m.userNo, m.mateListNum, m.userAge, m.userGender, u.userMBTI from user u, userRate r, campStyle c, mateList m where u.userNo in (select userNo from mateList where mateNo = #{mateNo}) and u.userNo = r.userNo and u.userNo = c.userNo and u.userNo = m.userNo and m.mateNo = #{mateNo};
SELECT brazier, burner, chair, icebox, lantern, powerstrip, sleepingbag, table1, tarp, tent FROM mateCampEquipRequire WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mateList (userNo, mateListNum, userAge, mateNo, userGender) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{mateListNum}, #{userAge}, #{mateNo}, #{userGender})
mapper.select: SELECT userNo, userMBTI, campStyle1, campStyle2, campStyle3, campStyle4, campStyle5, campStyle6 FROM user WHERE userNo = #{userNo}
SELECT mbtiValue FROM mbti WHERE mbti1 = #{userNo} AND mbti2 = #{receiveNo}

select m.mateNo, m.mateCreateTime, m.mateUpdateTime, m.mateImageUrl, m.mateCampsite, m.mateCampstyle, m.mateCamptype, m.mateCampstart, m.mateCampend, m.contentId, m.mateStatus, m.userNo, m.lowestAge, m.mateContent, m.highestAge, m.mateTitle, m.memberlimit, u.userNickname from mate m, user u where m.userNo = u.userNo order by m.mateNo desc limit 5;
SELECT mateTitle FROM mate WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE mate SET mateStatus = 'N' WHERE mateNo = #{mateNo};
mapper.select: select mateNo from mate where date(mateCampstart) >= date(#{mateCampstart}) AND date(mateCampstart) <= date(#{mateCampend}) ORDER BY mateNo DESC;

SELECT mateNo FROM mateCampStyle WHERE (style1 = #{style1} AND style2 = #{style2} AND style3 = #{style3}) OR (style1 = #{style1} AND style2 = #{style3} AND style3 = #{style2}) OR (style1 = #{style2} AND style2 = #{style1} AND style3 = #{style3}) OR (style1 = #{style2} AND style2 = #{style3} AND style3 = #{style1}) OR (style1 = #{style3} AND style2 = #{style1} AND style3 = #{style2}) OR (style1 = #{style3} AND style2 = #{style2} AND style3 = #{style1}) ORDER BY mateNo DESC
SELECT mateNo FROM mateCampStyle WHERE (style1 = #{style1} AND style2 = #{style2}) OR (style1 = #{style2} AND style2 = #{style1}) ORDER BY mateNo DESC
SELECT mateNo FROM mateCampStyle WHERE (style1 = #{style1}) ORDER BY mateNo DESC

select m.mateNo, m.mateCreateTime, m.mateUpdateTime, m.mateImageUrl, m.mateCampsite, m.mateCampstyle, m.mateCamptype, m.mateCampstart, m.mateCampend, m.contentId, m.mateStatus, m.userNo, m.lowestAge, m.mateContent, m.highestAge, m.mateTitle, m.memberlimit, u.userNickname from mate m, user u where m.userNo = u.userNo AND m.mateNo in #{item}
